an Idle Gentleman with very WILD notions of men and thing*} y g ^ W . H . P A Y N E ,

character of Benedict.

*** It having been found impossible to produce the S e w Ballet (wit bout
additional rehearsals) In that manner which the patrons ot this theatre
have a right to expect, and are, it is hoped, accustomed to witness: its production is necessarily delayed until TO-MORROW ; and the numerous
parties w bo have secured places have the option of their money being
returned, or their seats being transferred.
